summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 MERCURY MILAN. WHILE DRIVING 25 MPH, THE STEERING WHEEL BECAME DIFFICULT TO OPERATE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE POWER STEERING AND TRACTION CONTROL INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE LOCAL DEALER (JORGENSON FORD, 8333 MICHIGAN AVENUE, DETROIT, MI 48210) WAS CONTACTED AND AN APPOINTMENT WAS SCHEDULED FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 144,000.
